ExpansionDef.label: Royalty
ExpansionDef.description: - Empire faction - Noble title progression for your colonists - Psychic powers for combat and social influence - Nobles gain psychics through ceremony - Tribal psychics commune with anima trees - Steal psychic power through quests - Meditate to gain focus - Nobles meditate on the throne - Tribals meditate in nature - Pyromaniacs meditate to fire - Others meditate to the dead, or to blank walls - Use noble permits to call Imperial troops, shuttles, and orbital strikes - Procedural quests - Host rich nobles, poor refugees, and others - Defend crashed shuttles - Serve as aerial shock troops - Build monuments, defeat enemies, recruit visitors - Mechanoid clusters may deploy on your map - Wear them down with artillery - Sneak in for pinpoint strikes - Engage in frontal attacks - Lure enemies or allies into the danger - Persona weapons with personality traits - New gear - Jump packs for tactical flight - Shield packs for emergency defense - Cataphract armor for heavy combat - Locust armor for long jumps - Grenadier armor with frag support - Phoenix armor for flame warfare - Ultratech melee weapons - Techprints of new technology - Imperial body implants to augment brains, stomachs, arms, and skin - New musical instruments - Royal victory end-game quest - New music album by Alistair Lindsay
